titleStmt.title: Nairātmyāprakāśa in Hevajrasādhanasaṅgraha, SUB Göttingen xc 14-30

msContents.summary: A palm-leaf manuscript in Newar hooked script, photographed by Rahul Sāṃkṛtyāyana in Ngor monestary.

layoutDesc.layout: 7 lines per page. Single string hole that breaks three lines.

body.p: oṃ namaḥ śrīnairātmyāyai ||

lg.l: bhavatu sa bhagavān vaḥ śreyase vajrasatvaḥ ||

body.p:
yogī khalu śmaśānādi manonukūle sthāne pañcāmṛtādisamayasevī sukhāsanopaviṣṭa
ṣṭo niḥsaṅgo niḥśaṅka satvārthodyamati nairātmyāhaṃkāram utpādya hṛtsūrye nīlahūṃkāraṃ dhyāyāt | tatasthadīpai raśmibhis traidhātukam avabhāsamānair ākṛṣyā
kaniṣṭhabhuvanavarttinam aṣṭayoginīparivṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhujam aṣṭāsyaṃ kapālamālāviracitaśekharaṃ catuścaraṇasamākrāntacaturmmāraṃ nīlavarṇṇaṃ da
kṣiṇakaranikarakalitakapālasakalanilīnagajaturagakharavṛṣabhakarabhamanujasarabhavṛṣadaṃśaṃ | itarapāṇikadambagatapadmabhāja
navarttidharaṇivaruṇasamīraṇajvalanarajanīnāthataraṇiyamadhanadaṃ || kṛṣṇapradhānavadanam indukundāvadātadakṣiṇamukham atimātralohi
tavāmavadanam atidhūmravikarālorddhvavaktram alamalinetarasakalavadanaṃ | śatārddhamuṇḍamālālaṃkṛtaṃ nairātmyāliṃgitaṃkandharam ambarataralavartti
nam agrato dhyāyāt |

tadanantaraṃ bāhyapūjāguhyatatvapūjābhir aṣṭayoginībhiḥ pūjayet | atra ca prajñopāyayos tādātmabhāvaniryātanā'dhyeṣyaṇāś ca kṛtvā ca
turbrahmavihārān bhāvayitvā sakalavastutatvasārasaṅgrahākātmakaṃ || oṁ śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako 'haṃ || śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmakāḥ sarvvadharmmā
iti mantrārthaṃ bhāvayan apratiṣṭhitarūpeṇa tiṣṭhet ||

tataḥ praṇidhim anusmṛtya samādher vyutthāya | repheṇa purataḥ sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dhyātvā tatra tpa hūṁkāreṇa vi
śvavajrañ ca dhyātvā tato viśvavajrāta sphuradbhir aṇusaṃhater vvajraiḥ vajraprākārai pañjarabandhanam adho vajramayīṃ bhūmi parikhāñ ca viñcintayet | ravi
viśvavajrābhyāṃ ca raśmībhūya samantataḥ prasṛtābhyāṃ tata sarvvaṃ dṛḍhīkuryāta |

tadanantaraṃ khadhātau dharmodayākārām antaḥśuśirām atibahaladhava
lām ūrddhvāṃ prajñāṃ paśyet | tatas tadantarvvartti viśvavarṇṇāṣṭadala viśāla kamalaṃ dhyāyāt | tatas tanmadhye rephodbhavasūryyamaṇḍalamadhyavarttihūṁkāra
pariṇataṃ viśvavajraṃ cintayeta | vijaśvavajramadhye ca mārutatejojalāvani dhūmraraktaśuklaharitāni dhanuḥtrikoṇaparimaṇḍalacaturasrākā
rāṇi yaṁraṁvaṁlaṁpariṇatāni upary upari paśyet | etat sarvaṃ jñānamātraṃm ākalayan tatapariṇataṃ caturasraṃ caturdvāram aṣṭastambhopaśobhitaṃ hārārddha
hārabhūṣitaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ paśyet |

tataḥ prākārābhyantare aṣṭa śmaśānāni cintayet || atra pūrve devendro harītakīvṛkṣa mecakavarṇṇo dantivadanaḥ || dakṣiṇe
yamaś cūtavṛkṣa mahiṣānanaḥ sitavarṇṇaḥ | paścime aśokatarau varuṇo raktaḥ siṃhamukhaḥ | uttarato bodhiśākhini kubero haritābho manuṣyamukhaḥ |

agne
yāṃ karañja vaiśvānaraḥ śuklavarṇṇaś cchāgānanaḥ | latājaṭyāṃ naravāhano manuṣyamukhaḥ pāṇḍuḥ naiṛtyāṃ | vāyavyāṃ kakubhavṛkṣe pavano mṛgānanaḥ pītaḥ | aiśā
nyā bhūteśo vṛṣabhānanaś citro nyagrodhapādape | sarve cāmī vāmakarakalitakapālā nānāstravyagradakṣiṇapāṇayaḥ | darśitapūrvārddhakāyā
ḥ |

evaṃ pūrvvādiaṣṭadikṣu yathākramam anantapadmavāsukimahāpadmatakṣakaśaṃkhapālakarkkoṭakulikāḥ | meghāś cāṣṭau mecakaśuklaśitipā
ṇḍuraktapītaharitaviśvavarṇṇāḥ cintanīyāḥ || evaṃ dikpālāś cāśṭau pakṣavarṇṇāni bodhavyāni ||

tato maṇḍalamadhye aṣṭadalaṃ raktakamalaṃ vicintya
tatkamalamadhyapūrvvādicaturdaleṣu tathā kūṭāgāracatuḥkoṇeṣu caturdvāreṣv adha ūrdvañ ca pañcadaśaśavān paśyet | tadanantaraṃ śavārūḍhān ālikālipa
riṇatacandrasūryyamadhyagatān akārādipañcadaśasvarān dhyāyāt | tato 'kārādibījapariṇāmena sarvvatra sabījā karttikā | tataś candrasūryyasabījakarttikā
pariṇāmena nairātmyādipañcadaśayoginī dhyāyāt || tatrādarśajñānavāṃś candraḥ samatājñānavān sūryyaḥ | tayor mmadhyagataṃ bījaṃ pratyavekṣaṇā sarvveṣām aikyaṃ kṛtyānuṣṭhā
naṃ bimbaniṣpattiḥ suviśuddhadharmmadhātuḥ |

atra varaṭakamadhye dhyeyāḥ | akārasvarasahyā dveṣātmikā | akṣobhyamudritā vijñānaskandhātmikā prajñopāyasvarūpā bahiru
pāyarūpakhaṭvāṅgāliṅgitakandharā nairātmyā || pūrvvādidaleṣu | a ā i u svarasambhavāḥ | mohapaiśunyarāgairṣyāsvabhāva vairocanaratnasambhavāmitā
bhāmoghasiddhimudritāḥ | rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāskandhātmikāḥ | vajrāgaurīvārīvajraḍākinī dhyāyāta |

tato bāhyapuṭe aiśānyādikoṇeṣu | ṛ
ū ṛ ṝ ḷ svarāniāṣpannā akṣobhyavairocanaratnasambhaḥvāmitābhāmudritāḥ | pṛthivyāptejovāyusvabhāvāḥ | pukkaśīśavarīcaṇḍālīḍombīḥ paśyet |

tataḥ pū
rvādidvāreṣu ḹ e ai o svarasambhavāḥ sparśādimudrāmudritāḥ | rūpaśabdagandhasvarūpā gaurīcaurīvetālīghasmaryyo bhāvyāḥ | tadanantara adha ūrddhvañ ca moharāge mudrite au
aṃ svarasaṃbhave sparśadharmmadhātusvabhāve bhavanirvvāṇasvarūpe bhūcarīkhecaryyā bhāvayet |

atra ca devīnām utpattyanantaraṃ svakuleśābhiṣeke sati svakuleśamudrā bodha
vyā |

etā pañcadaśayoginyaḥ ṣoḍaśābdāḥ sūryyamaṇḍalasthā bhinnāñjanābhā bodhicittasvabhāvā jvalitapiṅgalordvakeśāḥ | tāluke vajrasatvasvabhāvācatura
ṅgulakapāladhāriṇyaḥ śirasi ca pañcabuddhasvabhāvaśuddha pañcamuṇḍāni bibhratyaḥ | raktavartulatrinetrā daṃṣṭrākarālavadanāḥ pañcadaśamātṛkāsvabhāvā śuṣkapañcada
śamuṇḍamālālaṃkṛtāḥ | vyāghracarmmāvṛtā kaṭinitambāḥ | arddhaparyyaṅkanādyasthāḥ śavārūḍhāḥ pañcamudrādharāḥ |

lg.l: mekhalā bhajituṃ mudrāṃ | tyaktuṃ prāṇivadhaṃ rucakaḥ |

body.p:
keśānāṃ raktapiṅgatā mahārāgatākhyāpanāya krodhapratipādanāyordvatā | kāyavākcetasām atirāgasvabhāvatvāt svabhā
vānāṃ netrāṇāṃ mahārāgatā | bhavanirvvāṇasvabhāvau bāhū | mānādidoṣān karttituṃ karttikā | traidhātukaviśuddhyā skandhādicaturmmārarudhirapūrṇṇaṃ trimukhaṇḍaṃ kamalavi
kalpaśarīri kapālaṃ | dharmmasaṃbhoganirmāṇaviśuddhyā tribhaṅgāṃ | svābhāvikakāyaviśuddhyā śarīrayaṣṭiḥ | anāvaraṇatākhyāpanāya vyāghracarmmavasanatā | traidhātukā
nālambanatākhyāpanāyānardhenākacaraṇatā ekarasatākhyāpanāya ekapādākrāntabhūtalatā |

tadanantaraṃ hṛdvarttibījavinirgati pañcākāraraśmibhir akani
ṣṭhabhuvanavarttijñānasatvasvabhāvaṃ nairātmyācakram ānīya hṛdbīje praveśayet | jñānasatvasamayasatvayor aikyaṃ bhūtvā nairātmyāhaṃkāram udvahana nairā
tmyāsamayo bhaveta |
atra ca ṣaḍaṅgayogavyavasthārtham anukrameṇa kṛṣṇaraktapītaharitapītanīlaśuklavarṇṇā bhāvanīyāḥ |

tatra bhāvanāprakarṣaprakrameṇa
prathamaṃ meghasaṃcchannaṃ pūrṇacandravad bhāti | tato pi prakarṣān māyāvad bhāti | tato pi prakarṣāt svapnavata prakāśate | tadanantaraṃ prakarṣaparipākāt sva
pnajāgraddaśayor abhedaprāpto mahāmudrāyogī sidhyati || ity utpattikramaḥ ||

anyatra bolakakkolasaṃyogān mahāsukharūpi paramaviramadhyagabodhicittaṃ jāyate
yat tad eva pañcadaśakalātmakaṃ jhaṭiti pūrvoktavarṇṇacihnasaṃsthānapañcadaśayoginīrūpa paśyeta | tasya hi pañcaskandhacaturdhātuṣaḍviṣayakāyavākcittasvabhāvatvād iti
gambhīrotpattikramaḥ ||
jhagiti bījam anavalokayana eva pañcadaśayoginyātmakaṃ maṇḍalacakraṃ paśyed iti | utpannakramaḥ ||

atha pariniṣpannakramaḥ || vajraśarī
re khalu jñānādhiṣṭhite dvātriṃśan nāḍyo mahāsukhasthānāt sravaṃti | tāś ca pañcadaśa yoginya iti śarīram eva nairātmyācakrātmakaṃ || tathā hi lalanārasane karṇṇād ā
rabhya nābhiṃ yāvad vāmetarapārśvavarttinyau candrasūryyākhye | | nābher adhas te eva yonināḍyau lalanārasane akṣobhyarudhiravahe | avadhūtī śiraḥkaṇṭhahṛ
nnābhiṃyonimadhyasthā bodhicittāvahā etā nāḍyo nairātmyā |

abhedyāsūkṣme śiraḥśikhāsthe yathāsaṃkhyaṃ nakhadantakeśalomalakṣaṇayugmayugalavahe
vajrā | divyā dakṣiṇakarṇṇe tvajmalavaho vāmā pṛṣṭhavaṃśe piśitavahā gaurī | vāmanīkūrmaje vākarṇṇabhrūmadhyesthe snāyvasthimālāvahe vārī | bhāvakī
seke cakṣurbbāhumūlesthe vṛkkahṛdayavahe ḍākinī |

doṣāvatīmahāviṣṭe kakṣastanavarttinyau cakṣuḥpittavahe pukkasī | mātarāsarvvaryyau nābhināyakasāgrasthe phu
pphuṣāntranālāvahe śabarī | śītadoṣme mukhakaṇṭhasthe pārśvatantūdaravahe caṇḍālī | pravaṇā hṛdaye viṣṭhāvahā hṛṣṭavadanā hṛlliṅge sīmantamadhyagā ḍombī |

svarū
piṇīsāmānye na mayāmeḍhragudayoḥ śleṣmapittavahe gaurī | hetudāyikāviyoge ūrujaṃghayoḥ śoṇitasvedavahe caurī | premaṇīsiddhe pādāṅguṣṭhalipādapṛṣṭha
yor mmedaḥkheṭavahe vettālī | pāvakīsamāne aṅguṣṭhajānudvayasthe tatra pūrvvā kheṭavahā aparā lā siṃhāṇavahā te ime ghasmarī |

hṛtkamalakarṇṇikāpūrvvādidāladale
ṣu yathākramaṃ trivṛttākāminīgehācaṇḍikāmāradārikāḥ | tatra prathamā nāḍīdvayaṃ bhūcarī | atra ca yā nāḍī yaṃ prasṛte puṣṇāti gacchati vā sā tadvā
hā |

kiñ cetāḥ kāyavākcittadharmmasambhoganirmmāṇatribhavasvabhāvāḥ | ścatuścakreṣu śarīreṣu vyavasthitāḥ | tatra nirmmāṇacakraṃ viśvavarṇṇaṃ catuḥ
ṣaṣṭidalaṃ kṛṣṇāṃkārabījaṃ nābher adho vyavasthitam ūrdvamukhañ ca | dharmmacakraṃ śuklāṣṭadalakamalaṃ kṛṣṇavarṇṇahūṁkārabījaṃ hṛddeśe vyavasthi
ta | kaṇṭhe sambhogacakraṃ raktaṣoḍaśadala raktapraṇavabījaṃ | śirasi śukladvātriṃśaddalaṃ śuklahaṃkārabījam adhomukhaṃ kṣaratpīyūṣadhāraṃ mahāsukhacakraṃ | atrā
nandakṣaṇabhedādivyavasthā gurūpadeśato bodhavyā |
anābhogayuganaddhavāhi bodhicittasākṣātkaraṇaṃ svābhāvikaḥ kramaḥ ||

tato bhāvanākhinno nairātmyāhaṃkāram u
dvahana mantra japet | tatrāmī sahajasiddhāḥ praṇavādyāḥ svāhāntāḥ pañcadaśasvarasvabhāvā akārādayo mantraḥ || tadyathā || oṁ a ā i ī u ū ṛ ṝ ḷ ḹ e ai o au aṁ
svāhā ||

p.add: japet || tatrāyaṃ mantraḥ || oṁ a ka ca ṭa ta pa ya śa svāhā ||
oṁ akāro mukhaṃ sarvvadharmmāṇām ādyannutpannatvāt oṁ āḥ hūṁ phaṭ svāhā || balimantraḥ |

body.p: tadanantaraṃ maṇḍalacakrasākṣāddaśāyāṃ stanau hṛtvā svābhāṅganāṃ kakkolamadhyavartti bolaṃ kuryyāta | pārśvadvayaṃ ghaṇṭāṃ vidadhyāta |

lg.l:
cakranayā śāstrasāraṃ
raṃ jñātvā yatnena sadguroḥ
gahanamaṇḍalacakraviniścayo bata bhavet katham atra śarīriṇāṃ |

śaba
ranāthapadāmbujareṇubhir yadi na rūkṣitamastako bhavet |

body.p: nairātmyāprakāśaḥ samāptaḥ || kṛtir iyaṃ śrīmatpaṇḍitācāryyāvadhūtādvayavajrapādānām iti ||
